page.title: 15Adverts
page.content: I looked into some local newspapers for adverts on Tiptree. Tiptree's Jam Factory which is famous world wide for its jam has had its secretary's idea taken up. His idea was to have a stamp printed on the Jam Factory's centenary. He helped to design the stamp with the fruit fields surrounding the factory. Mr Dickson from Tiptree will have to decorate his bedroom ceiling again when his 160 model aeroplanes which hang from it go to North Weald Restoration museum. Mr Dickson started to collect and make the models when he came out of hospital. T.J.Evers LTD. in New Road Tiptree has Bradstone Paving, Fence Panels, Timber and boards and a lot more. Tiptree's main toy shop is D. Bassingham. It sells toys, models and games. From Lego to Action Men.
